attributes.action: we want all ex soliders from all the conflicts not just afghanistan and iraq to have all the treatment all the ex soliders need the same treatment and they are not getting it..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we need for ex soliders to have the help that all the soliders are getting now. all the ex soliders are being ignored and getting lost in the loop over the new conflicts.
all the ex soliders that are injured and have lost limbs due to fighting for there country are being ignored, not getting the treatment that is offered to the soliders that are injured in the current conflicts, which is totally wrong these men and women need the same right as the what is being offered to the injured soliders now...please sign this petition as we need voices for the ex soliders of all the conflicts not just iraq and afghanistan!!!!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. We would also recommend that you specify in your title that you are referring to injured ex-soldiers, as it's not clear from the title that this is the subject of your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
